question: In which nation "Livingstone Falls" is located?
explanation: Livingstone Falls is located in the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is a series of rapids on the lower course of the Congo River which is downstream from Pool Malebo. It is located in western equatorial African region. One of the later portions of the Livingstone Falls is Inga Falls, which is on the Congo River. There a proposal, as of 2014, to construct the largest hydro-electric power generating facility on earth in the Inga Falls.
